gml:Definition.gml:description: Those having an appropriate location, size, and form as a cutoff zone, buffer zone, or condemnation zone necessary for the prevention of uncontrolled urbanization, pollution, or disasters.
Those that have traditional or cultural significance in the area in combination with shrines, temples and other structures, ruins, etc., or in connection with folklore or customs and practices.
Those that have excellent scenery and are necessary to ensure a healthy living environment for the residents of the area.
Properly preserved habitats or habitats for plants and animals that are necessary to ensure a healthy living environment for the inhabitants of the area.
Green spaces with functions as green infrastructure, such as rainwater storage and infiltration
